* Iron Raptor stood off to the side of the room while holding the sword in 
her hand, she was completely shocked!She had thought that Liono just would 
have given her a pat on the back and a few good words, but not this!*

" Third in command?" she said in a soft whisper.

* She just stood there not knowing what to do, just a few cycles ago she had 
just been a new comer fighting a battle...now this?
Iron Raptor looked at the sword in her grasp, she almost felt as if it were 
something that would crumble into dust if the slightest wind was to come 
into the room. It was special, it was powerful, it was an honor to be able 
to have this blade as her own to fight with.
Iron Raptor put the blade away in her back compartments where it would stay 
until the next battle, she would not fail to live up to Liono's expectations 
as his third in command!
She looked over to Plintissa, smiled then turned on her heel and walked out 
of the room and towards the place where she now belonged, the bridge.*
